title: Bitcoin Eyes $40K as $1B in BTC Withdrawals Suggests Bullish Mood
description: Data shows over $1 billion worth of BTC has been withdrawn from exchanges recently.

title: Michael Saylor’s MicroStrategy Purchased $600M Bitcoin In November
description: Business intelligence firm MicroStrategy, the largest corporate holder of Bitcoin, purchased around 16,139 BTC worth around $608 million at current prices in November. The purchase means the company has increased its Bitcoin holdings by 10%, with the firm now holding over $5 billion worth of Bitcoin.

title: Here’s an ‘Obvious’ timeline for Spot Bitcoin ETF approval – Anthony Scaramucci
description: Anthony Scaramucci, the founder of SkyBridge Capital, is extremely optimistic regarding the approval of the spot Bitcoin ETF filings by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). This transpires subsequent to the SEC officials’ consultation with Blackrock representatives regarding the prospective approval of the ETF. Bitcoin ETFs will be here sooner rather than later BTC’s ... Read more

title: Medical AI and the Call for Shared Responsibility
description: The growing incorporation of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in healthcare has sparked a debate about legal accountability in the event of medical mishaps. Experts are advocating for an update in product liability law to ensure AI’s safe use in medicine. This call for change has been notably articulated by Professor Kim Hwa of Ewha Womans University ... Read more

title: SOLANA PRICE ANALYSIS & PREDICTION (December 1) – Sol Poises For Fresh Increase But Faces Resistance At $62, Can It Overcome?
description: This week saw Solana through a small increase after establishing new support above the monthly low. However, it encountered rejection as it failed to sustain recovery above a minor resistance – currently up by 2%. Sol’s bulls lost steam lately after marking a two-year high at $68 two weeks ago. title: FTX and Alameda transferred $10.8m in cryptocurrency to three exchanges
description: Firms FTX and Alameda transferred $10.8 million in cryptocurrency to the Wintermute, Binance and Coinbase exchanges. According to Spot On Chain, the companies — now under receivership — transferred $10.8 million in eight crypto assets: 10 million StepN (GMT) ($2.58…

title: US Treasury Demands Accountability from Non-US Stablecoin Issuers
description:
On Wednesday, the U.S. Deputy Secretary of the Treasury Wally Adeyemo warned about the risks posed by non-U.S. stablecoin issuers that use the U.S. dollar as backing. Adeyemo argued that foreign stablecoin issuers are obliged to implement robust procedures preventing bad actors from misusing their stablecoins, and should not enjoy the privilege of banking on […]

The post US Treasury Demands Accountability from Non-US Stablecoin Issuers appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Willy Woo Says On-Chain Bitcoin Metric Flashing Same Bullish Pattern As Last Year’s Market Bottom
description:
Popular on-chain analyst Willy Woo says one indicator that marked Bitcoin’s (BTC) 2022 bottom is suddenly flashing bullish again. Woo tells his one million followers on the social media platform X that BTC is flowing off of exchanges similarly to how it did when the crypto market reached a bottom last year. “Bitcoin flows presently […]

The post Willy Woo Says On-Chain Bitcoin Metric Flashing Same Bullish Pattern As Last Year’s Market Bottom appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
